name: TX PULSE ATEX 600-037
description: The ATEX certified LoRa pulse sensor allows you to count the pulses of the connected gas meter. This remote reading sensor, ATEX certified – Zone 0, can be used with any type of gas meter with a dry contact or open collector output. The ATEX LoRa pulse sensor counts the number of pulses generated by the gas meter and periodically sends the meter’s index value.The ATEX LoRa Pulse sensor can turn a traditional pulse gas meter into a communicating meter. It comes with a 2m pulse cable, which can be replaced with a Binder interface cable.
author: Akenza AG
